item.title: How to make items NON-member?
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

I Don’t really know about making items non-member, but i would suggest just making everyone automatically member, its probably much easier, just search something like

playerismember

in player.java, and change it from a 0, to a 1, so they’re automatically member when their account is created.
Might look something like this

//Setting Welcomescreen information Calendar cal = new GregorianCalendar(); int day = cal.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH); int month = cal.get(Calendar.MONTH); int year = cal.get(Calendar.YEAR); int calc = ((year * 10000) + (month * 100) + day); playerLastLogin = calc; playerLastConnect = ""; playerIsMember = 1; <---- 0 = non member, 1 = member playerMessages = 0;
When your done, save, compile, and… yeah

Read full topic
